title: A Coffee in Berlin (Full Movie) Comedy, Drama

sources.title: A Coffee in Berlin (Full Movie) Comedy, Drama
sources.description:
A fateful day pushes an aimless college dropout (Tom Schilling) to stop wasting his time and finally engage with life.

Starring Tom Schilling, Friederike Kempter, Marc Hosemann
Directed by Jan Ole Gerster
2014
